name: hallsley
0:
”Alexa, open my hood”
”Alexa, ask my hood for events”
”Alexa, ask my hood for reminders”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my hood
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you know what is happening in your neighborhood? Alexa does.
Are you tired of trying to find emails describing some activities in your neighborhood?, This skill will help you take care of those issues, you just need to ask Alexa and Alexa will have the answers for you.

Just say: Alexa, ask my hood for events, and you will hear a detailed list of events that will be happening in the near future (up to 2 weeks in the future), you can also say: Alexa, ask my hood for reminders, this invocation will return all the reminders that you need to be aware off, like HOA contributions deadlines, meetings, registrations, etc. or you can say: Alexa ask my hood for all and you will hear/see a list of events and reminders that need your attention.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
